schema_version.description: Semantic-like version tag, e.g. v1.0 or v1.2.3

study_id.description: Internal opaque ID for this study/article

exposures.description: Exposure variables assessed in the study.

comparisons.description: Contrasts to estimate effects (between groups or exposure levels).

analysis_plan_registered.description: Link/registratie van vooraf gespecificeerd analyseplan (indien aanwezig)

causal_dag.description: Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) for causal assumptions

backdoor_paths.description: Identified backdoor paths from exposure to outcome

robins_e.description: ROBINS-E (Risk Of Bias In Non-randomized Studies - of Exposures) assessment

follow_up_scheme.description: Fixed vs variable follow-up; scheduled visits

eligibility_criteria.description: Who would be eligible for the trial

treatment_assignment.description: How treatment is assigned at time zero

categories.description: For categorical exposures: ordered list of levels

per_unit_effect.description: Optional: unit increase for contrast definition (meta info)

per_unit.description: For continuous exposure, effect per unit

ContrastEffect.description: Statistical effect estimate with confidence interval

type.description: Type of effect measure (RR=Risk Ratio, OR=Odds Ratio, HR=Hazard Ratio, etc.)

p_value.description: Statistical significance p-value (number or threshold string as reported)

favors.description: Which group the effect favors based on clinical interpretation

rationale.description: Why this is expected to have no causal effect

rule_out_approach.description: What strength of confounding can be ruled out

ps_model.description: Model used to estimate propensity score

max_smd_after.description: Max absolute standardized mean difference post-balance

doubly_robust_details.description: For AIPW, TMLE, and other doubly robust methods

reri.description: Relative Excess Risk due to Interaction

late.description: Local Average Treatment Effect (complier average causal effect)

version.description: Version of the terminology system used

extractor.description: Person or system that performed extraction

transformation_notes.description: Notes about data processing or transformation

consensus_status.description: Status of reviewer consensus (for double extraction)

reviewers.description: List of reviewers involved in extraction

LanguageCode.description: BCP 47 language tag supporting language, region, and variants (e.g., 'en-US', 'zh-Hans-CN', 'ar-EG')

source.description: External identifier source system including preprint servers and academic publishers

id.description: Identifier value within the source system

url.description: Optional direct URL to the external resource

version.description: Version number for preprints or versioned documents

id.description: arXiv identifier (new: YYMM.NNNN or old: subject-class/YYMMnnn)

doi.description: DOI with comprehensive character support including brackets and extended punctuation

content_hash_sha256.description: SHA-256 hash van bronbestand of platte tekst (64-char hex)

published_date_precision.description: Precision can only be specified if published_date is present

page_end.description: End page requires start page to be specified

vancouver_source.description: Vancouver source reference requires vancouver_citation to be present

published_date.description: Day precision requires full date format YYYY-MM-DD
Month precision allows YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD format
Year precision allows YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format

SourceRef.description: Reference to a specific location within a document

anchor.description: Free-text pointer like 'Table 2', 'Fig 1', or sentence quote

FHIRCoding.description: FHIR R5 Coding datatype for medical terminology

system.description: URI that identifies the code system

code.description: Symbol in syntax defined by the system

userSelected.description: If this coding was chosen directly by the user

hdi.description: Whether this is a Highest Density Interval

Registration.description: Clinical trial or study registration information

registry.description: Clinical trial registry (includes major international and regional registries)

url.description: Direct URL to the registration record

identifier.description: ClinicalTrials.gov identifier format: NCT followed by 8 digits
ISRCTN identifier format: ISRCTN followed by 8 digits
UMIN-CTR identifier format: UMIN followed by 9 digits
ChiCTR identifier format: ChiCTR followed by 10 digits

given_names.description: Author's full first and middle names

orcid.description: ORCID identifier with checksum validation (optionally with URL prefix)

corresponding.description: Whether this author is the corresponding author

email.description: Contact email address (typically for corresponding authors)

parser_name.description: Name of the parsing tool/library used

DataIntegrity.description: Data integrity verification with multiple hash algorithms

salt.description: Optional salt value for enhanced security

verification_timestamp.description: When the hash was computed or verified

verified_by.description: System or person who verified the hash

multiple_hashes.description: Additional hash values using different algorithms for enhanced verification

value.description: SHA-256 hash must be 64 hex characters
SHA-512 hash must be 128 hex characters
SHA-3-256 hash must be 64 hex characters
SHA-3-512 hash must be 128 hex characters
BLAKE2b hash must be 128 hex characters
SHA-1 hash must be 40 hex characters
MD5 hash must be 32 hex characters
CRC32 hash must be 8 hex characters

AIProcessingMetadata.description: Metadata for AI/ML processing and bias detection

fine_tuned.description: Whether model was fine-tuned for specific domain

bias_assessment.description: Assessment of potential biases in AI model

informed_consent.description: Whether data subjects provided informed consent for AI processing

data_minimization.description: Whether data minimization principle was applied

right_to_explanation.description: Whether explanations are provided to affected individuals

human_oversight.description: Level of human oversight in AI decisions

impact_assessment.description: Whether algorithmic impact assessment was conducted
